ISSUE.TITLE: Search engine friendly page names: Column 'name' is empty in overview
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to 'Search engine friendly page names' from the 'System' menu. Expected 'name' column to be filled, but is empty: ![capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1829944/42530411-6078b1ee-8481-11e8-9fdc-b5a1946e537c.PNG)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3131 Fixed search engine friendly page names
